trans-unit.source: Finding Ace by DAISY on this computer...

trans-unit.note: Used as the name on a tab of the Accessibility Checks screen.

trans-unit.source: "Accessible Books" are books that work well for people with impaired vision. With the ePUB format*, it is possible to make "Born Accessible" books that work well for everyone**, regardless of vision. Bloom has the following tools to help you create these books:
trans-unit.note: The * and ** are footnote markers that should remain the same.
trans-unit.target: "Vitabu vifikivu" ni vitabu vinavyofanya kazi vizuri kwa watu wasio na uwezo wa kuona. Na fomati ya ePUB *, inawezekana kutengeneza vitabu vya "Born Accessible" ambavyo hufanya kazi vizuri kwa kila mtu **, bila kujali maono. Bloom ina zana zifuatazo za kukusaidia kuunda vitabu hivi:

trans-unit.source: This tool, the Accessibility Checker, has:
trans-unit.target: Zana hii, Kikaguaji cha Ufikivu, ina:

trans-unit.source: The "Accessibility Checklist" which is where Bloom checks over your book and points you to anything that needs attention, especially for speakers of minority languages.
trans-unit.target: "Orodha ya Upatikanaji" ambayo Bloom hukagua kitabu chako na kukuelekeza kwa chochote kinachohitaji umakini, haswa kwa wasemaji wa lugha za wachache.

trans-unit.source: The "Ace by DAISY Checker" searches the actual ePUB generated by Bloom looking for any problems.
trans-unit.target: The "Ace by DAISY Checker" searches the actual ePUB generated by Bloom looking for any problems.

trans-unit.source: While the ideal is that a single book can serve everyone, the ePUB standard and ePUB readers do not actually support that. They currently only work for blind people who speak a language that is supported by "Text to Speech" (TTS) systems. At this time, TTS is only available for large or commercially interesting languages. Until the standard and accessible readers improve, it is necessary to make special versions of accessible books for minority language speakers. For blind readers to hear the image descriptions, we need to put something special on the page. In this version of Bloom, you do this by clicking the "Include image descriptions on page" checkbox in the Publish:ePUB screen. Future versions may have other options in this area.
trans-unit.target: No bora kama kitabu kimoja kinaweza kuhudumia kila mtu, kiwango cha ePUB na ePUB reader hakiungi mkono hiyo. Hivi sasa zinafanya kazi tu kwa watu wasioona ambao huzungumza lugha ambayo inasaidiwa na mifumo ya "Nakala kwa Hotuba" (TTS). Kwa wakati huu, TTS inapatikana tu kwa lugha kubwa au za kuvutia za kibiashara. Hadi kiwango na kisomaji kinachopatikana vitapobereshwa, ni muhimu kufanya matoleo maalum ya vitabu vinavyoweza kupatikana kwa wasemaji wa lugha chache. Kwa wasomaji vipofu kusikia maelezo ya picha, tunahitaji kuweka kitu maalum kwenye ukurasa. Katika toleo hili la Bloom, unafanya hivi kwa kubofya kisanduku cha kuangalia "Jumuisha maelezo ya picha kwenye ukurasa" kwenye skrini ya Chapisha: ePUB. Matoleo ya baadaye yanaweza kuwa na chaguzi zingine katika eneo hili.

trans-unit.source: It appears that some part of the folder path to this book has been moved or renamed. As a result, Bloom cannot save your changes to this page, and will need to exit now. Iwapo hujakuwa ukivipa vitu majina upya au kuvisongesha, tafadhali bofya Maelezo yaliyo hapa chini na uripoti tatizo hili kwa wataalamu husika.

trans-unit.source: You may use this space for author/illustrator, or anything else.

trans-unit.source: When you make a book from a shell, use this box to tell who did the translation.
trans-unit.target: Unapotengeneza kitabu kutoka kwa sheli, tumia kitabu hiki kusema aliyetafsri.

trans-unit.note: Used on the Title page of a book when "Paste Image Credits" is clicked and all the images in the book are by one illustrator. Put {0} in the translation where the image credits should go. For example in English, 'Images by {0}.' comes out like 'Images by John Doe, Copyright John Doe 2017, CC-BY-NC.'
Put {lang} in your translation, so it can be replaced by the language name.

trans-unit.target: Bofya kwenye Kuhakiki Haki ya Kunakili na Leseni.

trans-unit.source: Acknowledgments for this version, in {lang}. For example, give credit to the translator for this version.
trans-unit.note: Put {lang} in your translation, so it can be replaced by the language name.

trans-unit.source: Use this to acknowledge any funding agencies.
trans-unit.target: Tumia hii kutambua maajenti wote waliopeana usaidizi wa kifedha.

trans-unit.source: International Standard Book Number. Leave blank if you don't have one of these.
trans-unit.target: Nambari ya Wastani ya Kitabu ya Kimataifa. Acha wazi iwapo huna mojawapo ya hizi.

trans-unit.note: The {0} is replaced by the filename of an image. The {1} is replaced by a reference to the first page in the book where that image occurs.

trans-unit.source: If you need somewhere to put more information about the book, you can use this page, which is the inside of the front cover.

trans-unit.note: This is used to separate items in a list, such as 'Province, District, Country' on the Title Page. For English, that means comma followed by a space. Don't forget the space if your script uses them.

trans-unit.source: Something to tell the reader/viewer that this is the end of the book.
trans-unit.target: Kitu cha kumwambia msomaji / mtazamaji kuwa huu ndio mwisho wa kitabu.

trans-unit.source: Something to tell the reader/viewer that this is the end.
trans-unit.target: Kitu cha kumwambia msomaji / mtazamaji kuwa huu ni mwisho.

trans-unit.note: Used on the Title page of a book when "Paste Image Credits" is clicked. Put {0} in the translation where the list of page numbers should go and put {1} in the translation where the image credits should go. For example in English, 'Images on pages {0} by {1}.' comes out like 'Images on pages 1, 2, and 4 by John Doe, Copyright John Doe 2017, CC-BY-NC.'

trans-unit.target: Ya kwanza au utambulizi wa (Sheli) katika {lang}

trans-unit.note: On the Credits page of a book being translated, Bloom shows the original copyright. Put {0} in the translation where the copyright notice should go. For example in English, 'Adapted from original, {0}.' comes out like 'Adapted from original, Copyright 2011 SIL'.

trans-unit.source: Adapted from original without a copyright notice.
trans-unit.note: On the Credits page of a book being translated, Bloom shows this if the original book did not have a copyright notice.
trans-unit.target: Ilichukuliwa kutoka kwa asili bila ilani ya hakimiliki.

trans-unit.note: On the Credits page of a book being translated, Bloom puts texts like 'Licensed under CC-BY', so that we have a record of what the license was for the original book. Put {0} in the translation, where the license should go in the sentence.

trans-unit.source: Simple line drawings look best. Instead of using this page, you can also make your own thumbnail.png file and set it to Read-only so Bloom doesn't write over it.

trans-unit.note: Used on the Title page of a book when "Paste Image Credits" is clicked. trans-unit.source: Try closing other programs and restart your computer if necessary.
trans-unit.target: Jaribu kufunga programu zingine na uanze tena kompyuta yako ikiwa ni lazima.

trans-unit.source: Feel free to modify or delete this page.
trans-unit.target: Jisikie huru kurekebisha au kufuta ukurasa huu.

trans-unit.source:
The file youve chosen is a JPEG file. JPEG files are perfect for photographs and color artwork. However, JPEG files are a big problem for black and white line art. Problems include:
 Fuzziness and grey dots.
 Large file sizes, making the book hard to share.
 If there are many large JPEGs, Bloom may not have enough memory to make PDF files.

Note: Because JPEG is lossy, converting a JPEG to PNG, TIFF, or BMP actually makes things even worse. If this is black and white line art, you want to get an original scan in one of those formats.

Please select from one of the following, then click OK:
trans-unit.target:
Faili uliyochagua ni faili JPEG. JPEG faili huwa bora zaidi kwa picha na kazi ya sanaa ya rangi. Hata hivyo, JPEG faili huwa tatizo kuu kwa sanaa ya mistari mieusi na mieupe. Matatizo yanajumuisha:
 Siobainika na vitone vya rangi ya kijivuu.
 Faili kubwa, na kuifanya vigumu kusambaza kitabu.
 Iwapo kuna vingi vikubwa JPEG, Bloom huenda isiwe na nafasi ya kutosha ili kutengeneza PDF faili.

Kumbuka: Kwa sababu JPEG ni hasara, kubadilisha JPEG kuwa PNG, TIFF, BMP kwa kweli huharibu mambo zaidi. Iwapo hii ni sanaa ya mstari mweusi na mweupe, unataka kupata skani kwa mojawapo ya miundo hiyo.

Tafadhali chagua mojawapo ya yafuatayo, kisha bofya SAWA:

trans-unit.note: This text appears if an error occurs while perfoming automatic splitting of audio (an audio file corresponding to an entire text box will be split into multiple sections, one section per sentence).
trans-unit.target: Hitilafu imetokea wakati wa kugawanya rekodi.

trans-unit.note: This text appears on the button the user can press to trigger automatic splitting of audio. An audio file corresponding to an entire text box will be split into multiple audio files (one per sentence) instead. (Also known as "Forced Alignment" in technical terms)

trans-unit.source: Make an e-book that can play audio recordings while highlighting text.
trans-unit.target: Tengeneza kitabu cha mtandao ambacho kinaweza kucheza yaliyorekodiwa unapoweka alama ya kusisitiza kwa sentensi.

trans-unit.note: Shown in edit tab multilingualism chooser, for trilingual mode, 3 languages per page

trans-unit.source: This book is in translate-only mode. If you want to make other changes, click this to temporarily unlock the book.

trans-unit.target: Kitabu hiki kiko katika hali ya kutafsiri tu. Ikiwa unataka kufanya mabadiliko mengine, bonyeza hii ili kufungua kitabu kwa muda.

trans-unit.note: User is supposed to choose a file containing HTML that can be embedded in an element of the book.

trans-unit.source: Bloom had a problem showing this book. This doesn't mean your work is lost, but it does mean that something is out of date, is missing, or has gone wrong.
trans-unit.target: Bloom imekuwa na tatizo katika kuonyesha kitabu hiki. Hii haimaanishi kuwa kazi yako imepotea, lakini inamaanisha kuwa kuna kitu kimepitwa na wakati, kimepotea, au kimeharibika.

trans-unit.note: displays as a "toast", {0} is the URL/filename

trans-unit.source: Bloom was unable to start its own HTTP listener that it uses to talk to its embedded Firefox browser. If this happens even if you just restarted your computer, then ask someone to investigate if you have an aggressive firewall product installed, which may need to be uninstalled before you can use Bloom.
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, shorter wording): Bloom was unable to start its own HTTP listener that it uses to talk to its embedded Firefox browser. If this happens even if you just restarted your computer, ask someone to investigate if you have an aggressive firewall product installed. The agressive firewall product may need to be uninstalled before you can use Bloom.
trans-unit.target: Bloom ilishindwa kuanzisha kifaa cha HTTP cha kusikiza ambacho huwa inatumia kuwasiliana na kifaa chake kilichotiwa ndani cha mtandao wa intaneti. Iwapo hii itatendeka hata ingawa ulikuwa tu umefungua upya kompyuta yako, ambia mtu achunguze iwapo una kifaa kinachotumika kwa nguvu ambacho kimewekwa kwenye mtandao. Kifaa hiki kinachotumika kwa nguvu kilicho kwenye mtandao kinaweza kuhitajika kutolewa kabla ya wewe kuweza kutumia Bloom.

trans-unit.source: Bloom had trouble saving a page. Please click Details below and report this to us. Then quit Bloom, run it again, and check to see if the page you just edited is missing anything. Sorry!
trans-unit.target: Bloom ilipata shida kuhifadhi ukurasa. Tafadhali bonyeza Maelezo hapa chini na uturipoti hii. Kisha acha Bloom, ikimbie tena, na angalia ikiwa ukurasa ambao umebadilisha tu umekosa chochote. Samahani!

trans-unit.note: The placeholder {0} represents the current version of Bloom. For example, {0} might be replaced with "4.3"

trans-unit.source: This might be caused by Windows Defender "Controlled Folder Access" or some other virus protection.
trans-unit.note: After an October 2017 windows update, this appears when Bloom opens a collection and tries to write out the collection settings.
trans-unit.target: Hii inaweza kusababishwa na Windows Defender "Udhibiti wa Folda Iliyodhibitiwa" au kinga nyingine ya virusi.

trans-unit.source: This program cannot write to the folder {0}.
trans-unit.note: This only happens on Windows after an October 2017 update, {0} is the folder that Bloom failed to write to.
trans-unit.target: Programu hii haiwezi kuandika kwa folda {0}.

trans-unit.source: Your computer denied Bloom access to the book. You may need technical help in setting the operating system permissions for this file.
trans-unit.target: Kompyuta yako ilikataza Blook kupata kitabu. Unaweza kuhitaji usaidizi wa kifundi ili kuandaa mfumo wa utenda kazi idhini ya kupata faili hii.

trans-unit.source: Upgrade to the latest Bloom (requires Internet connection)

trans-unit.source: There was a problem selecting the book. Restarting Bloom may fix the problem. If not, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom Developers.
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, added spaces): There was a problem selecting the book. Restarting Bloom may fix the problem. If not, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom Developers.
trans-unit.target: Kulikuwa na tatizo katika kuchagua kitabu. Kufungua upya Bloom kunaweza kusuluhisha tatizo hili. Iwapo haitawezekana, tafadhali kliki kifute cha 'Maelezo' na uripoti tatizo kwa Wataalamu husika wa Bloom.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem updating the book. Restarting Bloom may fix the problem. If not, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom Developers.
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, added spaces): There was a problem updating the book. Restarting Bloom may fix the problem. If not, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom Developers.
trans-unit.target: Kulikuwa na tatizo katika kutengeneza upya kitabu. Kufungua upya Bloom kunaweza kusuluhisha tatizo hili. Iwapo haitawezekana, tafadhali kliki kifute cha 'Maelezo' na uripoti tatizo kwa Wataalamu husika wa Bloom.

trans-unit.source: Bloom cannot start properly, and this symptom has been observed on machines with ZoneAlarm installed. Note: disabling ZoneAlarm does not help. Nor does restarting with it turned off. Something about the installation of ZoneAlarm causes the problem, and so far only uninstalling ZoneAlarm has been shown to fix the problem.
trans-unit.target: Bloom haiwezi kujifungua inavyofaa, na dalili hii imeonekana kwenye mashine zilizowekwa King'ora cha Eneo. Kumbuka: kuzima King'ora cha Eneo hakusaidii. Wala kufungua upya huku kikiwa kimezimwa. Kitu fulani kuhusu uwekaji wa King'ora cha Eneo husababisha tatizo, na hivyo kukitoa king'ora cha eneo tu kumeonyesha kusuluhisha tatizo.

trans-unit.source: A component of Bloom, BloomPdfMaker.exe, seems to be missing. This prevents previews and printing. Antivirus software sometimes does this. You may need technical help to repair the Bloom installation and protect this file from being deleted again.
trans-unit.target: Sehemu ya Bloom, BloomPdfMaker.exe, inaonekana kupotea. Hii inazuia kuonekana kwa onyesho la awali na uchapishaji. programu ya antivairasi wakati mwingine hufanya hivi. Unaweza kuhitaji usadizi wa kifundi ili kukarabati uwekaji wa Bloom na kuzuia faili hii kufutika tena.

trans-unit.source: A collection of shell or template books in one or more languages of wider communication. You will be able to upload these shells to BloomLibrary.org. You may also make a Bloom Pack to give to others so that they can make local language books with your shells.
trans-unit.target: Mkusanyiko wa sheli au vitabu vya vigezo katika lugha moja au zaidi za mawasiliano mapana. Utaweza kuziweka sheli hizi kwenye BloomLibrary.org. Pia unaweza kutengeneza Seti ya Bloom kuwapa wengine ili waweze kutengeneza vitabu kwa lugha ya mama kutoka kwa sheli zako.
Mkusanyikko wa Lugha ya mama/Lugha ya eneo

trans-unit.source: A collection of books in a local language.
trans-unit.target: Mkusanyiko wa vitabu katika lugha ya eneo.

trans-unit.source: These are optional. Bloom will place them in the right places on title page of books you create.

trans-unit.source: Unable to create a new collection using that name.

In order to keep things simple and organized, Bloom keeps all the books you make in one or more Collections. The first thing we need to do is make one for you.
trans-unit.target: Ili kufanya mambo kuwa rahisi na kuwa yenye mpangilio, Bloom huweka vitabu vyote unavyotengeneza kwenye Mkusanyikommoja au zaidi. Jambo la kwanza tunalopaswa kufanya ni kukutengenezea moja.

trans-unit.source: Bloom detected that this collection is located in your Dropbox folder. This can cause problems as Dropbox sometimes locks Bloom out of its own files. If you have problems, we recommend that you move your collection somewhere else or disable Dropbox while using Bloom.
trans-unit.target: Bloom iligundua kuwa mkusanyiko huu uko kwenye folda yako ya dropbox. Hii inaweza kusababisha matatizo kwa kuwa wakati mwingine dropboksi wakati mwingine hufungia Bloom kutoka kwa faili zake. Iwapo una matatizo, tunapendekeza kuwa usongeshe mkusanyiko wako mahali pengine au uizime dropboksi yako utakapokuwa ukitumia Bloom.

trans-unit.source: This collection is part of your 'Sources for new books' which you can see in the bottom left of the Collections tab. It cannot be opened for editing.
trans-unit.target: Mkusanyiko huu ni sehemu ya 'Vyanzo vya vitabu vipya' ambavyo unaweza kuviona chini upande wa kushoto wa Nembo ya Mkusanyiko. Haiwezi kufunguliwa ili kuhakikiwa.

trans-unit.source: Please install Adobe Reader so that Bloom can show your completed book. Until then, you can still save the PDF Book and open it in some other program.
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali weka Kifaa cha kusoma cha Adobe ili Bloom iweze kuonyesha kitabu chako kilichokamilika. Hadi hapo, bado unaweza kuhifadhi PDF Kitabu na ukifungue kwenye programu nyingine.

trans-unit.source: That's strange... Adobe Reader gave an error when trying to show that PDF. You can still try saving the PDF Book.
trans-unit.target: Hilo sio jambo la kawaida... Kifaa cha kusoma cha Adobe kilionyesha kuwepo kwa hitilafu katika harakati ya kujaribu kuonyesha hiyo PDF. Bado unaweza kujaribu kuhifadhi PDF Kitabu.

trans-unit.source: Sad News. Bloom wasn't able to get Adobe Reader to show here, so Bloom can't show your completed book.\nPlease uninstall your existing version of 'Adobe Reader' and (re)install 'Adobe Reader'.\nUntil you get that fixed, you can still save the PDF Book and open it in some other program.
trans-unit.target: Ripoti Mbaya. Bloom haikuweza kupata Kifaa cha Adobe cha Kusoma ili kuonyesha hapa, hivyo Bloom haiwezi kukuonyesha kitabu chako kilichokamilika.\nTafadhali toa tafsiri ilioko ya 'Kifaa cha kusoma cha Adobe' na uweke upya 'Kifaa cha kusoma cha Adobe'.\nHadi utakapoweza kufanya hivyo, bado uaweza kuhifadhi PDF Kitabu na kukifungua kwenye programu nyingine.

trans-unit.target: Kutangaza kitabu kwa programu za Bloom reader kwenye mtandao wa ndani...

trans-unit.note: Button that tells Bloom to begin offering this book on the wifi network.

trans-unit.source: The layout of this book is currently "{0}". Bloom Reader will display it using "{1}", so text might not fit. To see if anything needs adjusting, go back to the Edit Tab and change the layout to "{1}".
trans-unit.target: Mpangilio wa kitabu hiki kwa sasa ni "{0}". Bloom Reader itaionesha kwa kutumia "{1}", kwa hivyo maandishi hayawezi kutoshea. Ili kuona ikiwa kuna kitu kinachohitaji kurekebisha, rudi kwenye Kichupo cha Hariri na ubadilishe mpangilio kuwa "{1}".

trans-unit.note: This is shown in the 'Save' dialog when you save a bloom book in the format that works with the Bloom Reader Android App

trans-unit.source: Some audio elements are missing ids

trans-unit.target: Baadhi ya vipengee vya sauti havina vitambulisho

trans-unit.source: Make a booklet from the inside pages of the book.\nPages will be laid out and reordered so that when you fold it, you'll have a booklet.\n
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, add newline): Make a booklet from the inside pages of the book. Pages will be laid out and reordered so that when you fold it, you'll have a booklet.\n

trans-unit.note: This link opens a dialog box that lets you put in information someone (often a librarian) might use to search for a book with particular characteristics.

trans-unit.source: Upload to BloomLibrary.org, where others can download and localize into their own language.
trans-unit.target: Weka kwa BloomLibrary.org, pale ambapo watu wengine wanaweza kukitoa na kukitafsiri kwa lugha zao wenyewe.

trans-unit.source: Make a PDF of just the front and back (both sides), so you can print on colored paper.

trans-unit.note: Used in Epubs as the text of a link that leads from the image description back to the main page

Here, the English 'Accessibility' is a common way of refering to technologies that are usable by people with disabilities. With computers, this usually means people with visual impairments. It includes botht he blind and people who might need text to be larger, or who are colorblind, etc.
Shown in a progress box when Bloom is starting to create an ePUB
Used in Epubs as the text of a link that leads to the description of an image

Hakuna maelezo ya picha ya sauti

trans-unit.source: Sorry, Bloom cannot produce ePUBs if there are any comic bubbles. The first comic bubble is on page {0}.
trans-unit.note: The {0} will be replaced with the page number (or name of page). For example, it might be replaced by "1" or "Front Cover"
trans-unit.target: Samahani, Bloom haiwezi kutoa ePUBs ikiwa kuna viputo vyovyote vya kuchekesha. Kiputo cha kwanza cha kuchekesha kiko kwenye ukurasa wa {0}.

trans-unit.source: The following pages were removed because they are not supported in ePUBs:

trans-unit.note: label for the book content in the ePUB's Table of Contents

trans-unit.source: This ePUB preview is provided by [Readium]. This book may render differently in various ePUB readers.
trans-unit.note: [Readium] should be left untranslated as a noun. It will be changed into an HTML link to the Readium web page (https://readium.org/). If the term "Readium" has been translated on a translated version of that web page, then the translated term may be substituted within the square brackets. (Be sure to keep the square brackets [] around Readium or its translation!)
trans-unit.target: Uhakiki huu wa ePUB umetolewa na [Readium]. Kitabu hiki kinaweza kutoa tofauti katika wasomaji anuwai wa ePUB.
Tumia saizi ya maandishi ya kisomaji cha ePUB

trans-unit.source: Make an ePUB (electronic book) out of this book, allowing it to be read on various electronic reading devices.
trans-unit.target: Tengeneza ePUB (kitabu cha kielektroniki) kutokana na kitabu hiki, ukikiruhusu kuweza kusomwa kwenye vifaa tofauti vya kusoma vya kielektroniki.

trans-unit.note: This is the title of a dialog about exporting a Bloom book to the InDesign XML format
trans-unit.target: Habari kuhusu Muundo wa Ndani wa XML

trans-unit.note: The parenthesized word indicates the negative effect of using this option. This text is for a menu item.

trans-unit.source: Bloom cannot make booklets using the current page size.
trans-unit.note: If a book has a paper size that is too big (like A4), Bloom does not know how to make booklets with it. So the controls for booklets get disabled and this message is shown.
trans-unit.target: Bloom haiwezi kutengeneza vijitabu kwa kutumia saizi ya ukurasa wa sasa.

trans-unit.source: This PDF viewer can be improved by installing the free Adobe Reader on this computer.
trans-unit.target: PDF kifaa cha kutazama kinaweza kuboreshwa kwa kuweka kifaa cha kusoma cha Adobe cha bure kwenye kompyuta hii.

trans-unit.note: Instead of making a booklet, just make normal pages

trans-unit.target: Tengeneza PDF ya kila ukurasa wa kitabu, ukurasa mmoja kwa kila kipande cha karatasi.

trans-unit.source: Open the PDF in the default system PDF viewer
trans-unit.target: Fungua PDF kifaa cha kutazama kwenye mfumo wa kawaida PDF

trans-unit.target: Chagua ukubwa wa ukurasa na mwelekeo

trans-unit.source: Bloom was not able to create the PDF file ({0}).{1}{1}Details: BloomPdfMaker (command line) did not produce the expected document.
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed in a message dialog box. {0} is the filename, {1} is a newline character.
trans-unit.target: Bloom haikuweza kuunda faili ya PDF ({0}). {1} {1} Maelezo: BloomPdfMaker (mstari wa amri) haukutoa hati inayotarajiwa.

trans-unit.source: Bloom requires access to a printer in order to make a PDF, even though you are not printing. Windows gave this error when Bloom tried to access the default printer: {0}
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed in a message dialog box. {0} is replaced by a Windows error message at runtime
trans-unit.target: Bloom inahitaji ufikiaji wa printa ili kutengeneza PDF, ingawa hauchapishi. Windows ilitoa hitilafu hii wakati Bloom ilijaribu kupata printa chaguomsingi: {0}

trans-unit.source: Bloom needs you to have a printer selected on this computer before it can make a PDF, even though you are not printing. It appears that you might not have a printer set as the default. Please go to Devices and Printers and select a printer as a default. If you don't have a real printer attached, just select the Microsoft XPS or PDF printers.
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed in a message dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Bloom inahitaji uwe na printa iliyochaguliwa kwenye kompyuta hii kabla ya kufanya PDF, ingawa hauchapishi. Inaonekana unaweza kuwa hauna printa iliyowekwa kama chaguomsingi. Tafadhali nenda kwenye Vifaa na Printa na uchague printa kama chaguomsingi. Ikiwa hauna printa halisi iliyoambatanishwa, chagua tu Microsoft XPS au printa za PDF.

trans-unit.source: The book's images might have exceeded the amount of RAM memory available. Please turn on the "Use Less Memory" option which is slower but uses less memory.
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed in a message dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Picha za kitabu hicho zinaweza kuzidi kiwango cha kumbukumbu ya RAM inayopatikana. Tafadhali washa chaguo la "Tumia Kumbukumbu kidogo" ambayo ni polepole lakini haitumii kumbukumbu ndogo.

trans-unit.source: Bloom had a problem making a PDF of this book. You may need technical help or to contact the developers. But here are some things you can try:
trans-unit.target: Bloom ilikuwa na tatizo katika kutengeneza PDF kitabu hiki. Unaweza kuhitaji usaidizi wa kifundi au uwasiliane na wataalamu husika wa Bloom. Lakini hapa ni baadhi ya mambo unayoweza kujaribu:

trans-unit.source: Bloom had a problem making a PDF of this book.

trans-unit.note: explanation that file was not saved displayed in a message box
trans-unit.target: Faili ya PDF haijahifadhiwa kwa sababu umechagua kutoruhusu kutengeneza "PDF ya Mchapishaji".

trans-unit.source: Bloom uses Adobe color profiles to convert PDF files from using RGB color to using CMYK color. This is part of preparing a "PDF for print shop". You must agree to the following license in order to perform this task in Bloom.
trans-unit.note: Brief explanation of what this license is and why the user needs to agree to it
trans-unit.target: Bloom hutumia profaili za rangi ya Adobe kubadilisha faili za PDF kutoka kwa kutumia rangi ya RGB na kutumia rangi ya CMYK. Hii ni sehemu ya kuandaa "PDF ya duka la kuchapisha". Lazima ukubali leseni ifuatayo ili ufanye kazi hii katika Bloom.

trans-unit.note: Button that tells Bloom to save the book in the current format.

trans-unit.target: Inapatikana kwa Walio na matatizo ya kuona

trans-unit.source: All rights reserved (Contact the Copyright holder for any permissions.)

trans-unit.target: Tafadhali chagua lugha ya ishara kwa kitabu hiki

trans-unit.target: BloomLibrary.org Tayari ina tafsiri nyingine ya kitabu hiki kutoka kwako.Iwapo utakiweka tena, tafsiri hiyo nafasi yake itachukuliwa na tafsiri yako ya sasa.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, there was a problem uploading {0}. Some details follow. You may need technical help.
trans-unit.target: Samahani, kulikuwa na tatizo katika kuweka {0}. Baadhi ya maelezo yanafuata. Unaweza kuhitaji usaidizi wa kiufundi.

trans-unit.source: One or more fields above need your attention before uploading.
trans-unit.target: Nyanja moja au zaidi ya zilizoko hapo juu zinahitaji uangalifu wako kabla ya kuweka.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, "{0}" was not successfully uploaded. Sometimes this is caused by temporary problems with the servers we use. It's worth trying again in an hour or two. If you regularly get this problem please report it to us.
trans-unit.target: Samahani, "" haikufaulu kuwekwa. Wakati mwingine hii husababishwa na matatizo yasiyo ya kudumu yanayotokana na vifaa tunavyotumia. Ni muhimu kujaribu tena kwa muda wa saa moja au mbili. Iwapo utapata tatizo hili mara kwa mara tafadhali piga ripoti kwetu.

trans-unit.source: By uploading, you confirm your agreement with the Bloom Library Terms of Use and grant the rights it describes.
trans-unit.target: Kwa kuweka, unadhibitisha makubaliano yako na Masharti ya matumizi ya Maktaba ya Bloom na unaipa haki inayostahili.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem uploading your book.
trans-unit.target: Kulikuwa na tatizo katika kuweka kitabu chako.

trans-unit.source: In the Bloom community, we help each other by sharing both new and newly translated books on the Bloom Library.
trans-unit.target: Katika jamii ya Bloom, tunasaidiana kwa kushiriki vitabu vipya na vipya vilivyotafsiriwa kwenye Maktaba ya Bloom.

trans-unit.note: This is added after the language name, in order to indicate that some parts of the book have not been translated into this language yet.

trans-unit.source: We cannot sign you up with that address, because we already have an account with that address. Would you like to sign in instead?
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, added space): We cannot sign you up with that address, because we already have an account with that address. Would you like to log in instead?
OLD TEXT (before 4.9, changed log in to sign in): We cannot sign you up with that address, because we already have an account with that address. Would you like to log in instead?
trans-unit.target: Hatuwezi tukakufungulia akaunti kwa kutumia anwani hiyo, kwa kuwa tayari tuna akaunti inayotumia anwani hiyo. Je, badala yake ungependa kuingia kwenye akaunti yako?

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not connect to the server to verify your login. Please check your network connection.
trans-unit.target: Bloom haikuweza kuungana na mtandao ili kuthibitisha kuingia kwako. Tafadhali angalia intaneti yako.

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not connect to the server to complete your login or signup. This could be a problem with your internet connection, our server, or some equipment in between.
trans-unit.target: Bloom haijaweza kuunganishwa na mtandao ili kukamilisha kuingia kwako akaunti yako au kufungua akaunti mpya. Hii inaweza kuwa tatizo kutokana na uunganishaji wa intaneti, mtandao wetu, au baadhi ya vifaa hapo katikati.

trans-unit.source: In order to sign up for a BloomLibrary.org account, you must check the box indicating that you agree to the BloomLibrary Terms of Use.
trans-unit.target: Ili kufungua akaunti ya BloomLibrary.org, unapaswa kuweka alama kwenye kisanduku ukiashiria kuwa unakubaliana na Sheria za Matumizi ya Maktaba ya Bloom.

trans-unit.source: We don't have a user on record with that email. Would you like to sign up?
trans-unit.target: Hatuna kwenye rekodi zetu yeyote anayetumia barua pepe hiyo. Je, ungependa kufungua akaunti?

trans-unit.source: Password and user ID did not match
trans-unit.target: Neno la siri na jina lako la utambulizo havikuambatana

trans-unit.source: Please agree to terms of use
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali kubaliana na Masharti ya Matumizi

trans-unit.source: Please enter a valid email address. We will send an email to this address so you can reset your password.
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali weka anwani za barua pepe inayotumika. Tutatuma barua pepe kwa anwani hii ili uweze kubadilisha neno lako la siri.

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not connect to the server to reset your password. Please check your network connection.
trans-unit.target: Bloom haijaweza kuunganishwa na mtandao ili kubadilisha neno lako la siri. Tafadhali angalia intaneti yako.
Ubadilishaji wa neno la siri umefeli

trans-unit.source: We are sending an email to {0} with instructions for how to reset your password.
trans-unit.target: Tunatuma barua pepe kwa {0} ikiwa na maagizo ya jinsi ya kubadilisha neno lako la siri.

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not sign in to BloomLibrary.org using your saved credentials. Please check your network connection.
trans-unit.target: Bloom haijaweza kuingia kwa BloomLibrary.org kwa kutumia hati za utambulisho zilizohifadhiwa. Tafadhali angalia intaneti yako.

trans-unit.source: Sign up or sign in to BloomLibrary.org
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 4.9, added "sign in" and changed "log in" to "sign in"): Log in to BloomLibrary.org

We have kept the old message ID since a translation of that will be better than nothing. The terminology should ideally match the buttons in the dialog, which we don't control, such as "Sign in with Google", but so far we haven't been able to get those localized.

trans-unit.target: Kutengeneza picha ya ukucha wa dole gumbai...

trans-unit.source: Sorry, this version of Bloom Desktop is not compatible with the current version of BloomLibrary.org. Please upgrade to a newer version.
trans-unit.target: Samahani, tafsiri hii ya kompyuta ya Bloom haiambatani na tafsiri iliyopo yao BloomLibrary.org. Tafadhali ifanye kuwa ya tafsiri ya hivi karibuni.

trans-unit.source: Please sign in to BloomLibrary.org (or sign up) before uploading
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali ingia kwenye BloomLibrary.org (au ufungue akaunti) kabla ya kuweka

trans-unit.source: Please set this from the edit tab
trans-unit.note: This shows next to the license, if the license has not yet been set.
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali andaa hii kutoka kwa chaguo la kuhariri

trans-unit.source: Sign In / Sign Up to BloomLibrary.org
Oops, something went wrong when trying to sign you into our database.
trans-unit.target: Lo, kuna kitu kilienda mrama wakati wa kujaribu kukusajili kwenye hifadhidata yetu.

trans-unit.source: Suggestion: Assigning a Creative Commons License makes it easy for you to clearly grant certain permissions to everyone.
trans-unit.target: Pendekezo: Kupeana leseni bunifu ya Kawaida huifanya rahisi kwako kupeana idhini fulani kwa kila mtu.

trans-unit.source: Suggestion: Creative Commons Licenses make it much easier for others to use your book, even if they aren't fluent in the language of your custom license.
trans-unit.target: Pendekezo: Leseni Bunifu za Kawaida, hufanya kuwa rahisi zaidi kwa wengine kutumia kitabu chako, hata kama hawana ufasaha katika lugha yako ya leseni ya kawaida.

trans-unit.source: This book seems to be a template, that is, it contains blank pages for authoring a new book rather than content to translate into other languages. If that is not what you intended, you should get expert help before uploading this book.\n\nDo you want to go ahead?
trans-unit.note:
OLD TEXT (before 4.0, mark newlines properly): This book seems to be a template, that is, it contains blank pages for authoring a new book rather than content to translate into other languages. If that is not what you intended, you should get expert help before uploading this book.
Do you want to go ahead?
trans-unit.target: Kitabu hiki kinaonekana kuwa kiolezo, ambayo ni kwamba, ina kurasa tupu za kuandikia kitabu kipya badala ya yaliyomo kutafsiri katika lugha zingine. Ikiwa haukukusudia hivyo, unapaswa kupata msaada wa wataalam kabla ya kupakia kitabu hiki. \n\nJe, unataka kuendelea?

trans-unit.source: There was a problem uploading your book. This is probably because your computer is set to use the wrong timezone or your system time is badly wrong. See http://www.di-mgt.com.au/wclock/help/wclo_setsysclock.html for how to fix this.
trans-unit.target: Kulikuwa na tatizo katika kuweka kitabu chako. Hii huenda ikawa ni kwa sababu kompyuta yako imeundwa ili kutumia wakati usio sahihi wa eneo au saa yako ya mfumo ni mbaya sana. Tazama http://www.di-mgt.com.au/wclock/help/wclo_setsysclock.html jinsi ya kurekebisha hii.

trans-unit.source: Congratulations, "{0}" is now available on BloomLibrary.org ({1})

trans-unit.source: Separate each letter or letter combination with a space. For example, here is what we might use for the English language:
trans-unit.target: Tenganisha kila herufi au uunganishaji wa herufi kwa nafasi. Kwa mfano, hapa ni kile tunachoweza kutumia kwa lugha ya Kiingereza:

trans-unit.source: Notice that the English list includes symbols that are used to make words, like ' in

trans-unit.source: Do not include punctuation in this list. Bloom does not support the inclusion of punctuation in decodable stages.
trans-unit.target: Usijumuishe alama ya kituo katika orodha hii. Bloom haiungi mkono ujumuishaji wa alama y akituo katika hatua zinazoweza kutolewa.

trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, use literal NBSP character): Level
obsolete as of 4.9. New LevelLabelMax replaces it
{0} is a number. A heading for several items each of which specfies a maximum for a different quantity for a reader of the level specified by the number.
follows headings like "Level 1 Maximum" and "Letters". Should combine with those to convey "Maximum letters in any word". Surround text that should be bold in double asterisks.
Prior to 4.9, was "Maximum Average Length of Sentences in Book"
follows headings like "Level 1 Maximum" and "Words". Should combine with those to convey "Maximum averate sentence length in book". Surround text that should be bold in double asterisks.
trans-unit.target: Urefu wa wastani wa juu zaidi wa sentensi katika kitabu

trans-unit.note: follows headings like "Level 1 Maximum" and "Words". Should combine with those to convey "Maximum average words per page" (in book is implied). Surround text that should be bold in double asterisks.
follows headings like "Level 1 Maximum" and "Sentences". Should combine with those to convey "Maximum sentences per page". Surround text that should be bold in double asterisks.
follows headings like "Level 1 Maximum" and "Letters". Should combine with those to convey "Maximum letters in any word". Surround text that should be bold in double asterisks.
follows headings like "Level 1 Maximum" and "Sentences". Should combine with those to convey "Maximum sentences per page". Surround text that should be bold in double asterisks.

trans-unit.note: Surround text that should be bold in double asterisks.

This is a header in a table, under another heading "Words". Table cells contain values like 23(10) indicating that 23 is the maximum number of words allowed in a book (counting repeated words), and 10 is the maximum number of unique words (not counting repeats).

This is a header in a table, under another heading "Words" or "Sentences". Table cells contain values like 7(5) indicating that 7 is the maximum number of words (or sentences) on a page, and 5 is the maximum average number across all pages.

This is a header in a table, under another heading "Words". Table cells contain values like 3(2) indicating that 3 is the maximum number of words in any sentence, and 2 is the maximum average words per sentence.
This is a header in a table, under another heading "Letters". Table cells contain values like 7(5) indicating that 7 is the maximum length of any word, and 5 is the maximum average length of words.

trans-unit.target: , Injini ya Kutafuta ya Kusoma na Kuandika.

Idadi ya juu zaidi ya maneno kwa kila Sentensi.

trans-unit.note: follows headings "maximum" and "words" to convey "maximum words per sentence. Surround text that should be bold in double asterisks.

trans-unit.source: Bloom already knows which characters in the world's languages always mark the end of sentences. To add others, enter the Unicode character escapes here. For example for Thai script languages, enter \U0020 to tell Bloom that normal spaces are used to break sentences.
trans-unit.target: Bloom tayari inajua ni alama gani katika lugha za ulimwengu kila wakati zinaashiria mwisho wa sentensi. Ili kuongeza zingine, ingiza herufi ya Unicode hapa. Kwa mfano kwa lugha za maandishi ya Thai, ingiza \ U0020 kuambia Bloom kwamba nafasi za kawaida hutumiwa kuvunja sentensi.
Andaa kifaa cha Kusoma kinachoweza Kufasiriwa
Andaa kifaa cha kusoma kilichopewa ngazi

trans-unit.source: In addition, this Bloom Pack will carry your latest decodable and leveled reader settings for the "{0}" language. Anyone opening this Bloom Pack, who then opens a "{0}" collection, will have their current decodable and leveled reader settings replaced by the settings in this Bloom Pack. They will also get the current set of words for use in decodable readers.
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, remove unwanted backslashes): In addition, this Bloom Pack will carry your latest decodable and leveled reader settings for the \"{0}\" language. Anyone opening this Bloom Pack, who then opens a \"{0}\" collection, will have their current decodable and leveled reader settings replaced by the settings in this Bloom Pack. They will also get the current set of words for use in decodable readers.
trans-unit.target: Kwa kuongeza, seti hii ya Bloom itabeba mpangilio wa kifaa cha kusoma kilichopewa ngazi na kinachoweza kufasiriwa cha hivi karibuni cha lugha ya \"{0}\". Yeyote anayefungua seti hii ya Bloom, ambaye basi anafungua mkusanyiko wa \"{0}\" , atahitajika kubadilisha mpangilio wa kifaa chake cha kusoma kilichopewa ngazi na kutumia mpangilio ulio kwenye seti hii ya Bloom. Pia atapata kikundi cha majina ya kisasa ili kuyatumia kwenye vifaa vya kusoma vinavyoweza kufasiriwa.

trans-unit.source: Bloom was not able to submit your report directly to our server. Please retry or email {0} to {1}.

trans-unit.source: Bloom will include the following diagnostic information with your report:
trans-unit.target: Bloom itajumuisha habari ifuatayo ya uchunguzi na ripoti yako:

trans-unit.source: Bloom encountered an error and needs to quit
trans-unit.note: The title of the dialog after a Fatal error will cause Bloom to close.

trans-unit.target: Jumuisha picha hii ya kutoka kwa skrini

trans-unit.source: This issue can be viewed here:
trans-unit.note: This label is displayed before a link to the issue after it is created.
The end point label for the frequency slider.
The title of the dialog caused by a NonFatal error.

trans-unit.source: Please help us reproduce this problem on our computers.
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali tusaidie kuzaa tatizo hili kwenye kompyuta zetu.

trans-unit.source: Your report will go into our issue tracking system and will be visible via the web. If you have something private to say, please email to '{0}'.
trans-unit.note: The {0} is where the Bloom team's private email address will be inserted.
trans-unit.target: Ripoti yako itaingia kwenye mfumo wetu wa ufuatiliaji wa maswala na itaonekana kupitia wavuti. Ikiwa una jambo la faragha la kusema, tafadhali tuma barua pepe kwa '{0}'.

trans-unit.source: Bloom will include diagnostic information with your report. Your report will not be private.
trans-unit.target: Bloom itajumuisha habari ya uchunguzi na ripoti yako. Ripoti yako haitakuwa ya faragha.

trans-unit.note: Shown in the button that closes the dialog after a successful report submission, if there was a fatal error and we need to exit the program.
Shown if there was an error submitting the report. Lets the user try submitting it again.

trans-unit.source: See what else will be submitted
trans-unit.target: Tazama ni nini kingine kinapaswa kupeanwa

trans-unit.note: This is shown while Bloom is sending the problem report to our server.

trans-unit.source: We received your report, thanks for taking the time to help make Bloom better!
trans-unit.target: Tulipokea ripoti yako, asante kwa kutenga muda wako ili kusaidia Bloom kuwa bora zaidi!

trans-unit.note: The title of the dialog when a user chooses to Report a Problem.

trans-unit.source: What seems to be the problem?
trans-unit.target: Je, ni nini inaonekana kuwa tatizo?

trans-unit.note: This is the label for the text field where the user enters what they were doing at the time of the problem.

trans-unit.source: Bloom Enterprise adds features and services that are important for publishers, governments, and international organizations. This paid subscription meets their unique needs while supporting the development and user support of Bloom for the community at large.
trans-unit.target: Bloom Enterprise inaongeza vipengele na huduma ambazo ni muhimu kwa wachapishaji, serikali, na mashirika ya kimataifa. Usajili huu uliolipwa unakidhi mahitaji yao ya kipekee wakati unasaidia maendeleo na msaada wa watumiaji wa Bloom kwa jamii kwa ujumla.
